desmos tricks

this is a wiki where i’ll try to document cool things you can do with desmos the graphing calculator.

index

data types

  • numbers
    • complex mode
  • boolean
  • 2d point
  • 3d point
  • distribution

functions and operators

  • arithmetic
    • plus (+)
    • minus (−)
    • times (⋅)
    • division
    • exponents
    • roots (√)
    • logarithms
  • trigonometry
    • sine
    • cosine
    • tangent
    • cotangent
    • arctangent
    • atan2
  • lists
    • ellipsis operator (…)
    • list brackets
    • index brackets
  • conditions
    • braces {…}
    • ternary operator (…:…,…)

(work in progress)
